events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago and it still hasn’t arrived. The tracking info hasn’t updated for several days, and I’m really concerned about the delay.
System classified the customer’s issue under Delivery Delay based on keywords such as delay, tracking, and late shipment.
A customer service representative was assigned to handle the customer’s inquiry regarding their late shipment.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I understand your order is delayed, and I’m here to help you track it down.
Could you please provide your order number or tracking ID so I can check the current status of your shipment?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. I checked the tracking again and it still shows ‘in transit’ with no updates for five days.
Thank you for the details. I contacted the shipping carrier and they confirmed a delay due to weather. Your package should arrive within the next three days.
I appreciate the update, though it’s inconvenient. I will wait the additional time and hope it arrives soon.
We’ve updated your case to resolved as the delay is due to circumstances beyond our control but expected to be brief.
Just following up to check if your package has arrived. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Yes, the package arrived today, and everything is in good condition. Thanks for your help and communication.
The case has been formally closed following the successful delivery and positive customer feedback.
A satisfaction survey was sent to the customer to gather feedback on their experience with the support provided.
